title: GUYS I NEED HELP I CANT PLAY THE GAME FOR 2-3 DAYS PLS QUICK HELP
body:
My game is stuck in Authenticating and i need a quick help puls #Riotsolveit   
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

replies.body: An authentication error can occur when your network is being blocked from connecting to the authentication servers, so it can't log in you.  You'll want to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot.  As an addition, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help configure your firewall settings too.  I hope that helps!
Dude its not working :((( i want to play LOL and i cant play it for like 5 days       (IM IN EUW)

That sucks to hear, but thanks for trying.  In this case, grab the logs from the HRT and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can look into this with you individually and find some options.  Hang tight until then!

im also having this issue. So far i've only seen EUW or EUNE users have this problem. Tried all the options in the connection guide and contacted support but we havent been able to resolve the error yet. it's getting kinda annoying tbh
